title: Do repeat the tashhahud when doing Sujood as Sahu? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: when we say after the Salaam do we offer also another tashahud the answer is no you simply offer Salaam then immediately to prostrations saying subhanAllah Bell Allah Allahu Akbar assalamualaikum assalamualaikum warahmatullah so I hope this answers your question
